body_html: OK, it seems like some of the performance benefits needed be already by making binary blob with C++ TF API and accesing it through ctypes. Benchmarking is needed to decide if extra work of adding variables to XLA is justified. Will close this for now, will reopen if I come across some concrete numbers.

body: OK, it seems like some of the performance benefits needed be already by making binary blob with C++ TF API and accesing it through ctypes. Benchmarking is needed to decide if extra work of adding variables to XLA is justified. Will close this for now, will reopen if I come across some concrete numbers.
